0.title: Woofty's Revenge
0.plot: Struggling to recover from a lack of resources and corporate support and plagued by inexplicable equipment malfunctions, these southern Ghostbusters have always found a way to get the job done. But every team has its breaking point. Has our group of heroes finally gotten in over their head? Find out in this, LAGB's second entry and first cinematic film in the Ghostbusters Fan Film Cinematic Universe! Parental Guidance is suggested for mild crude humor and language.

2.title: Answer the Call
2.plot: Budget slashed, and morale low, these Bayou Busters do what they do because they love it, but every team has its breaking point. Problems begin to overwhelm them, and it becomes less and less clear whether those problems are due to budget cuts or something more nefarious. Relationships are grown and tested in this character-driven installment of the Louisiana Ghostbusters web series which tackles the age-old questions in Ghostbusters lore: When something happens that can't be explained and no conventional solution exists who is the only hope for you?

-1.title: LAGB Meets GB911
-1.plot: When Will "Fresh Meat" Ferguson decides to bail on the Twin Cities and aims for a sure shot Louisiana position, he quickly learns how hard it can be in other franchises and that he's in over his head.

imdb.plot outline: Struggling to recover from a lack of resources and corporate support and plagued by inexplicable equipment malfunctions, these southern Ghostbusters have always found a way to get the job done. But every team has its breaking point. Has our group of heroes finally gotten in over their head? Episodes are available on our Youtube channel and at laghostbusters.com Episode 3 of this series is currently in production (Summer 2017)
